Header: 2nd World War Memorial Put Up at Polonnaruwa
Content: A special memorial to commemorate the memories of fallen War Heroes in the 2nd World War built by Ex-servicemen and those still living in their dotage was unveiled at Galkoriya area in Polonnaruwa on Saturday (3) by HE the President Maithripala Sirisena. Floral tributes were paid to the memorial by the day’s Chief Guest, retired veterans and family members of all fallen War Heroes on the occasion. It was followed by religious observances, meant to transfer merits on the departed ones. (Picture Courtesy – President Media)
